Text.val: 07.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
13.02.2013 SH SCR17685 Added PI.ACL(OCM440DEL) for subprogram, called if button New/Modify is pressed
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
05.10.2011 SH SCR16776 Added special permission OCM440DEL for delete buttons
02.09.2005 AK (Additon to) SCR #8675 remove column "changed date"
-- Get special permision to enable delete button
The disabling of the delete and modify buttons is based on the Zorder
of the delete and modify controls on the screen (8 and 9)
if you change the Zorder - when you add new controls, you have to change
also the update condition of the virtual - v.Delete/modifyPbActieve?
press CTRL+H for extra range expression on SECU_DESCRIPTION
SECU_DESCRIPTION get to be translated before showing it on the screen
delete/modify buttons should only be enabled when this program is active
